text: (appeal) musa parannu: nilam ulutuvanea vila nanaykkuvanea upayeagappetuttunnatallatta, patukaleannumillatta avikalamaya oru pasuvayirikkanam atennan allahu parayunnatâ€Œ. avar parannu: ippealan tankal sariyaya vivaram velippetuttiyatâ€Œ. annane avar atine aruttu. avarkkat niraverruka eluppamayirunnilla
